q: advantage of a fire raging through the nearby headquarters of the ruling National Democratic Party in downtown Cairo, intruders climbed the gates, broke a window and entered the museum in bid to steal the mummies. But demonstrators in collaboration with security forces stopped the thieves and returned the relics to the museum-- but they were already damaged, Zahi Hawass said.`` Only their heads were intact,'' he added. The fate of the vandals remained unknown. The Egyptian museum, which houses invaluable treasures of antiquity, was

This move is a big one for ol' Google, as Eric Schmidt , Page and Sergey Brin have long run the company as a trio, an approach Page articulated quite clearly in the company's 2004 IPO filing: We run Google as a triumvirate. The three of us run the company collaboratively with Sergey Brin and me as presidents. The structure is unconventional, but we have worked successfully in this way. Though it goes against Google's well-worn techniques, Shmidt claims the reorganization won't hurt the company's mojo. In fact, he believes the new management structure will speed up the decision making process.

Coming off the bench for the first time as a Piston, Allen Iverson scored 17 points and led Detroit to a 107-97 victory over the slumping Milwaukee Bucks. With everything going on, I wanted to play well, Allen Iverson said.`` I just wanted to play well. Especially for my teammates because I let them down by not being here.'' Allen Iverson 's biggest assist to Chris Webber didn't come on a no-look pass. It came in words of encouragement to Philly's slumping newcomer.`` Just get your swagger

in Turkey, returned to the U.S. to have a lesion surgically removed from his right leg, spurring rumors he will retire. Allen Iverson denies this, as he wrote on his Twitter account: I have never said anything about retirement, nor have I said goodbye to the game of basketball. Once I get past this, my plan is to continue playing at the highest level possible. So don't put me in my rocking chair just yet. Hold on, I'll be back! It's not yet known if the lesion is benign or not, or if it's a cyst. Allen Iverson , 35, is expected to be out for several weeks
